name: Sign-In
description: Sign-in interface for patients and healthcare providers.

name: Patient Self Registration
description: New patient sign-up form; details are stored in Supabase and FrappeHealth.

name: Guided Tour # 1
description: An introductory guided tour for first-time users, showcasing basic application functionality with an option to skip, which if chosen, prompts the tour on the next sign-in.

name: Guided Tour # 2
description: The second part of the guided tour, highlighting additional features and tips for using the application.

name: Guided Tour # 3
description: The final segment of the guided tour, providing insights into advanced features and user settings.

name: App Navigation Drawer
description: A slide-out navigation drawer accessible from the footer menu for quick access to app sections.

name: Patient Dashboard
description: A dashboard displaying the patient's medication adherence over the past week, with the option to view historical data over custom date ranges.

name: Patient Dashboard # 2
description: An extended view of the patient dashboard showing detailed health metrics and progress.

name: Patient Profile
description: A comprehensive view of the patient's profile, medical history, and vitals.

name: Patient Profile contd...
description: Additional details of the patient's health history are listed for easy access and review.

name: Nurse linked to a Patient
description: Displays the nurse assigned to a patient, with the association managed through Frappe Nursing Task.

name: Add Medications
description: Allows patients or volunteers to add their ongoing medications. Drugs marked for clinical trials are managed and assigned by healthcare professionals via the Frappe web application.

name: Medication List
description: A list of the patient's or volunteer's medications, including clinical trial drugs, with options to update intake status, delete, or modify entries.

name: Nurse Profile
description: The profile of the nurse or healthcare provider, detailing their association with the patient.

name: Physician List
description: A directory of physicians or healthcare professionals affiliated with the healthcare center.

name: Physician Profile
description: In-depth information about the physician or healthcare professional, including education, experience, and certifications.

name: Appointment Booking
description: Patients can book and manage appointments based on available slots at the healthcare center or with a specific physician.

name: Upcoming Appointments
description: A view of patients' upcoming appointments, as well as a history of past appointments.
